targets.rawSql:
SELECT indicator AS ip,
       COUNT(*) AS hits,
       MAX(COALESCE(reputation_score,0)) AS max_score
FROM indicators
WHERE type='ip'
GROUP BY ip
ORDER BY hits DESC, max_score DESC
LIMIT 20;

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(last_seen,$__interval),
  COUNT(*) AS count
FROM indicators
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1;

SELECT
  (geo->>'lat')::float AS latitude,
  (geo->>'lon')::float AS longitude,
  MAX(COALESCE(reputation_score,0)) AS value,
  indicator AS ip
FROM indicators
WHERE type='ip' AND geo IS NOT NULL
GROUP BY latitude, longitude, ip;
